data.event: According to the 2010 census, its population was 5,145, a decrease of 17.8% from 6,260 in 2000.
Alexandria was platted in 1836 when it was certain that the Indiana Central Canal would be extended to that point.

event.title: was incorporated as a town in 1898

data.event: It was incorporated as a town in 1898.

event.title: is located at 40°15′47″N 85°40′35″W. According to the 2010

data.event: Alexandria is located at 40°15′47″N 85°40′35″W. According to the 2010 census, Alexandria has a total area of 2.63 square miles (6.81 km2), all land.
